initialContext: You're a software architect specialising in pattern detection. I have a log file that I want you to analyse. When you've finished analysing the log file elaborate an output message where you indicate the number of patterns that you've found in the log file and also a small description on each one of those patterns.

error_messages.service_unavailable: The AI model is currently unavailable due to high demand. Please try again in a few minutes.
error_messages.initial_context_missing: Initial context message is missing or undefined.

gemini_prompts.follow_up: Provide a detailed analysis of the software engineering process.

debug.send_request: Sending request body to Gemini API:
